title: Spiced Almond Hearts
ingredients: ['For the Biscuit', '150g plain flour', '100g caster sugar', '25g honey', '65g butter', '1 egg yolk', '1 pinch salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon aniseed powder', '1 teaspoon grated lemon zest', 'For the Topping', '1 egg white', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 teaspoon vanilla sugar', '1 tablespoon icing sugar', '100g almonds']
